name: My Life: Farm Vet
description:
They need you on the farm - examine and treat lots of animals!

Your job as a passionate vet is to examine sick farm animals, make the right diagnosis, treat them accordingly and nurse them back to health.
Build up trust with the small and large two- and four-legged friends so that they soon feel better again. Your help is called for on the farm!

What awaits you:
  • Design your own avatar
  • You can get to your missions by car, on horseback or by foot
  • Discover the large game world with 3 farms
  • Treat over 90 diseases in your practice or on site in the stables
Take care of these cute patients:
  • pigs & piglets
  • cows & calves
  • sheep & lambs
  • horses
  • goats
  • dogs
  • cats
  • chickens, ducks and geese
  • rabbits
